item.title: Solution to lag during DOTA 2 Alchemist acid spray on Ubuntu 17.10
item.description: This lag has been driving me nuts and I swear it did not lag like that before I upgraded my Ubuntu to 17.10.

item.title: Cloud storage solutions for Linux
item.description: Here are recommendations for cloud storage options that can be used on Linux. This includes Dropbox, Box, Yandex, and Google Drive. However, I used a workaround for Google Drive which may not necessarily be feasible for you.
